util

Class VolumeFitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.VolumeFitter

  • public class VolumeFitter
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class is used, to calculate fittingfunctions between a number of Echos.
    Author:
    Dominik Ridder

    • Method Detail

      • getZeroValues

        public int[] getZeroValues(Volume vol,
                           int slice,
                           int degree,
                           boolean logScale,
                           ij.process.ImageProcessor processor)
        This Method calculates one slice of the Zero Echo.
        Parameters:
        vol - The Volume, that contains the other Echos
        slice - The Number of the slice, that should be calculated
        degree - The degree indicates the function
        logScale - True means, that the values from the Image taken logarithmic
        processor - The Processor of the new Image/Slice
        Returns:
        The RGB values of the calculated Image/Slice

      • getPlot

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getPlot(Volume vol,
                                            ij.gui.Roi relativroi,
                                            int slice,
                                            int degree,
                                            boolean logScale,
                                            int wwidth,
                                            int wheight,
                                            int echonr)
        This Method calculates a fitting function to a given ROI in a Volume.
        Parameters:
        vol - The Volume, that contains the Echos
        relativroi - The roi that should be used for the calculation
        slice - The Slice that should be taken from the Echos
        degree - The Degree indicates the fittingfunction
        logScale - True means, that the image values taken logarithmic
        wwidth - The width of the Graphic
        wheight - The height of the Graphic
        echonr - The current Echo nr, that is displayed in a diffent color
        Returns:
        The Graph of the fitting function, including the taken grayvalues of the pointcloud

      • getMin

        public int getMin(ij.ImagePlus imp,
                  ij.gui.Roi roi)
        Returns the Minvalue of an Image in a given ROI.
        Parameters:
        imp - The Data, that contains the Imageprocessor
        roi - The shape, where the min value is needed
        Returns:
        The least value in the roi

      • getMin

        public int getMin(Volume vol,
                  int echon)
        Returns the minvalue of a ROI in a Volume and echo number.
        Parameters:
        vol - The Volume, that contains the ROI and Image Data.
        echon - The Echo nr that is searched throught.
        Returns:
        The min value of the roi
